sentences.en: He was likely a mere figurehead , unable to capitalize upon his abilities or realize his dreams.
sentences.cn: 他很可能被架空, 无法充分发挥自己的能力或者实现自己的梦想.

sentences.en: King is just a figurehead; it's the president who has the real power.
sentences.cn: 国王仅仅是挂名的首脑, 总统才真正握有实权.
那皇帝是有名无实的首脑.

sentences.en: The president will be little more than a figurehead.
sentences.cn: 主席将只不过是个傀儡而已。

sentences.en: The Queen is merely a figurehead.
sentences.cn: 女王只是名义上的元首。

sentences.en: The queen is only a figurehead.

words.tran_cn: 成形；外形；定形；比喻表达法；图案装饰法

trans.tran_cn: 挂名的首脑，傀儡，装饰船头的人像，〈谑〉嘴脸
trans.tran_en: a wooden model of a woman that used to be placed on the front of ships
